@xhunterzx wrote:

Im trying to put the server online so my friends can get on to test,So i did this,

In CLient.Java in Source Folder i searched for Server = and their was another ip their 5.124.something.something so i changed it to mine

if (playerRights == 0) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Player " +playerName+ " has logged out"; } playerServer = "69.124.70.202";

} else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("loadbackup") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Mod Steve")) { try{ for(int i = 0; i < playerBankSize; i++){ for(int i2 = 0; i2 < playerItems.length; i2++){ for(int i3 = 0; i3 < playerEquipment.length; i3++){ if(bankItems[i] < 1 && bankItemsN[i] < 1 && playerItems[i2] < 1 && playerItemsN[i2] < 1 && playerEquipment[i3] < 1){ loadcharbackup(); loadmoreinfo(); loadquestinterface(); loadweather(); loadothers(); loggedinpm(); playerServer = "69.124.70.202";

public int GetWorld(int PlayerID) { try{ /*String Server = PlayerHandler.players[PlayerID].playerServer; if (Server.equals("rs8.ath.cx")) { return 1; } else if (Server.equals("rsdeadlypkz.no-ip.biz")) { return 2; } else { //println_debug("Invalid Server: "+Server); return -5; }*/
Also for rs8.ath.cx i dont know what the hell that is, so i thought just leave it.

This is what i changed in Client.Java in Client Folder>>

My Ip is Also 69.124.70.202 << and my serverip is >> rsdeadlypkz.no-ip.biz

public static void setserver(String s, String p) { server = 69.124.70.202; port = 43594; } public final void method53(int i) {

     server = "rsdeadlypkz.no-ip.biz";

Also when i compile client.java in client folder i get this problem

client.java:2449: ';' expected server = 69.124.70.202; ^ 1 error Press any key to continue . . .

Please if anyone can help me ill be really thankfull, also if u can help in teamviewer it’d be much better, ill have it open for the next 3 hours i guess. so feel free to connect to me my id is:
